step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your arm straight overhead and feel the gentle resistance.
Excellent! Now, open your palm and fingers wide, feeling the stretch.
Great job! As you inhale, make a tight fist and tense your arm muscles.
Perfect! Exhale and relax your hand and arm, visualizing the fluid movement.
Second rep, keep that arm straight overhead and feel the resistance.
Nicely done! Open your palm and fingers wide, stretching out.
Keep it up! Inhale, make a strong fist, and tighten your muscles.
Fantastic finish! Exhale, relax your hand, and visualize the lymph flow.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the overhead pumping exercise! Remember to keep your arm straight overhead and focus on opening your hand wide and making a tight fist with each breath. This helps promote lymph flow effectively.
